attributes.action: help encourage action between west susex county council and network rail with regards to the roundstone level crossings East Preston with a view to improve safety for pedestrians and motorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to improve road layout and pedestrian access, as currently a bottleneck and accident waiting to happen.no major action is planned until 2012.by which time there could be the death of a child and numerous injuries

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help encourage action between west susex county council and network rail with regards to the roundstone level crossings East Preston with a view to improve safety for pedestrians and motorists."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18454


Prime Minister's Office
